title: No smart attributes to check ERROR
message:
The mac book works great, but sometimes just wont boot or stop working.
I replaced the cable and hard drive, but i keeping getting this error.
I wondering if you guys can help me figure out what's is the issue

Thank you

title: No smart attributes to check ERROR
message:
Which machine?
That error is normal if you installed a non-Apple drive.

title: No smart attributes to check ERROR

message:

What does that mean?
Isn't it just crashing because of the infamous C9560 cap?
